title: Curio – A Collection by Hilton celebrates brand’s first Latin American hotel
text:
Curio – A Collection by Hilton celebrates brand’s first Latin American hotel Adv: 
Jul 22, 2015 Adv: 
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina & MCLEAN, VA - Offering the perfect blend of modern luxury and storied history, Anselmo Buenos Aires today joined Curio – A Collection by Hilton. As Hilton Worldwide’s rapidly-expanding global collection of distinctive hotels, Curio caters to passionate travelers seeking local discovery and authentic experiences. Located in Buenos Aires’ historic neighborhood of San Telmo, Anselmo Buenos Aires is set amid Plaza Dorrego Square, one of the oldest public spaces in the city known for its diverse array of cafés, bars, shops and antique stores. 
“Originally built as a stunning mansion in 1906, Anselmo Buenos Aires pays tribute to a community rich in history that dates back to the 18th century, and provides guests with the perfect launching pad for a truly intriguing cultural experience,” said Dianna Vaughan, global head, Curio – A Collection by Hilton. “As a hotel that honors its proud past while also celebrating modern luxury that today’s savvy traveler has come to expect, we’re honored to welcome this beautiful property to our collection, and as our first hotel in Latin America.” 
With its first owner rumored to have been the famous tango musician and composer, Anselmo Aieta, the property maintains its original 1900s façade complemented by a modern design that includes spacious rooms and upscale restaurant and bar concepts. Throughout the hotel, guests will also enjoy contemporary décor and art – all infused with the area’s history and local flair. An interior plaza reflects local Argentine culture by giving guests an intimate setting in which to interact and unwind after a day of exploring Buenos Aires. Additional highlights include inviting communal gathering areas throughout the hotel and a fitness center offering state-of-the-art equipment, which will be available 24 hours a day. 
Guests can relax in one of 50 guest rooms, including four corner rooms, one with a balcony, a large suite featuring a spacious private balcony and two colonial rooms offering a view of Dorrego Square, one of them with a french balcony facing the square. The design of each guest room thoughtfully reflects the historical ambience of San Telmo combined with sophisticated and modern elegance. Guest room highlights include floor-to-ceiling windows, walk-in showers, sleek wooden floors, a mini-bar and views of the hotel’s inner plaza. Guests will also enjoy a plush bed with luxurious linens, a comfortable sofa, a 42-inch HDTV, complimentary Wi-Fi access and beautiful lighting that is unique within each room. 
"Our location in the heart of Buenos Aires, underscored by the reassurance that comes with the iconic Hilton name, will truly set us apart from other offerings in the market," said Carlos Alonso, managing partner, PKF hotelexperts Latin America. "During their stay at Anselmo Buenos Aires, our guests will not only experience the tremendous pride and passion our talented team has for our beloved Argentine culture, but they will also feel inspired to making new discoveries for experiences that are truly unforgettable." 
Providing very distinct dining experiences, the hotel features two restaurants – both of which celebrate Argentinean innovation: • Café Anselmo: Offering healthy regional dishes using the freshest local produce, guests will discover made-from-scratch Argentinean dishes and grilled meats served in a chic environment. • Anselmo Lounge: A trendy lounge with a historic twist, this restaurant creates the perfect setting for guests to enjoy locally-influenced signature cocktails, specialty snacks and desserts. 
For those seeking a memorable event or wedding, Anselmo Buenos Aires offers 3,300 sq. ft. of versatile meeting space for up to 100 guests. Spacious foyers offer a grand welcome that continues into the striking event space, and customized on-site catering centered on authentic Argentinean dishes and specialty cocktails will ensure every event – large or small – is a success. 
Anselmo Buenos Aires, Curio Collection by Hilton participates in Hilton HHonors, the award-winning guest-loyalty program for Hilton Worldwide’s twelve distinct hotel brands. Hilton HHonors Members always get our lowest price with our Best Price Guarantee, along with HHonors Points, free Wi-Fi, digital check-in and no booking fees only when they book through Hilton. Existing reservations are intact, and current and future guests may immediately begin earning and redeeming Hilton HHonors® points. 
Anselmo Buenos Aires, Curio Collection by Hilton is located at Anselmo Aieta 1069, Buenos Aires, C1103AAA, Argentina.
